Desc.eng: Turn back, little mortal. You donâ€™t belong to this place.
I need to get to the top of the mountain. Tell me: is there a way around the wall of ice?
No. But if my splinter-brothers agree, I can open up the way for you.
I think he means the other stone-heads around here.
Yes. If they find you worthy, you can pass. Be smart or be strong. These are the only rules.
I am the mountain. I am the voice of the rocks. I'm guarding this place.
When they told us that the mountain is a forbidden place, I didn't think that everyone would take it so seriously.
